name: Genuary 2023
description:
Genuary is a generative art challenge that takes place in January. This is a collection of 31 sketches that can endlessly produce new permutations when the regenerate button is clicked.


Made by Rianna Suen
with 3D models by Thomas Flynn and Saandy

Join the discord community and support me on patreon if you'd like. It'd make my day :)
